channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: Severn Trent coned off filter lane, 21st July
item.description:
Kingsditch roundabout, Cheltenham. Severn trent have qty2 works listed with no carriageway incursion. LB9011303-000014047424-01 and LB9011303-000014040528-01. But they have coned off the LH filter lane to use as a van park. So is this carriageway incursion or not??
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Tewkesbury Road, Kingsditch, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: The drain is blocked problem, 21st July
item.description:
Curretly made safe with cones, original job raised as edge deterioration however Broadbox Chamber is collapsing so possibly a rebuild of drain, Broadbox cover is intact and stable. Can you please pass on to the relevant AHR to arrange further inspection then possible rebuild. Possibly SOR job.
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects - Vegetation problem, 21st July
item.description:
Cut back approx 10m of hedges, 28 Days - Standard TM (Overgrown Hedge)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -FW6 Potholes problem, 21st July
item.description:
Pothole FW 400mm x 400mm x 250mm in hours 2hr Emergency Give and take TM With Temporary FW Closure Outside 4 Stats required Make safe only enquiry raised for AHR to attend Sink Hole (FW6 Pothole)
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: TMC - Defects -other CW6 problem, 21st July
item.description:
Abrupt Level Difference CW 5m x 600mm x 50mm 2 way traffic lights TM Just before Layby Unmarked due to volume of traffic Stats required 3m2 patch required (CW6 Abrupt Level Differences )
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Pot hole on drain near Iceland fire exit, 21st July
item.description:
Back of Iceland in the car park on a drain you canâ€™t miss it. My pregnant partner fell over and injured herself we are thinking of suing

item.title: This is the pathway down the side of badhams in sixways. Leading from the carpark to the London road. Liquid which looks like sewage is coming out of manhole. It's getting worse., 21st July
item.description:
Sewage maybe. On pavement.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): London Road, Cheltenham
